original_text: Moses agreed to stay with Reuel. Reuel gave his daughter Zipporah to Moses as his wife.
korean_text: 모세가 그와 동거하기를 기뻐하매 그가 그의 딸 십보라를 모세에게 주었더니

sentences.original_text: Moses agreed to stay with Reuel.
Reuel gave his daughter Zipporah to Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 르우엘은 자기의 딸 십보라를 모세에게 주었고
